title: Elements organised: the periodic table
creator_credit: David Jackson, Tony Jolly, BBC and Open University
brief_description: A series of excellent demonstrations, with graphics, showing how the great variety in the behaviour of the elements can be organised into a systematic structure, the Periodic Table. Please note that there is some background noise on the tape. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
